subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: In October, Michael Phelps tripped and fell while getting into a car in Ann Arbor, Mich., where he trains. He tried to brace himself with his right hand and ended up breaking his wrist.
snippet: In October, Michael Phelps tripped and fell while getting into a car in Ann Arbor, Mich., where he trains. He tried to brace himself with his right hand and ended up breaking his wrist.
